tossup_question: 13) CHEMISTRY  What is the energy required to form a gaseous cation from a gaseous atom?
bonus_question: 13) CHEMISTRY  What properties do metallic compounds have that others lack?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Conductivity in the liquid phase
X) Conductivity in the solid phase
Y) Solid at room temperature
Z) Brittle lattice structure
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) Conductivity in the solid phase
